meanings.definition: The property of not being additive.
meanings.sent1: The nonadditivities of the ingredients in the recipe made it challenging to calculate the total calories.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the nonadditivities of the chemicals to understand their combined effects.
meanings.sent3: The nonadditivities of the puzzle pieces caused confusion among the players.
meanings.sent4: Her nonadditivities in the group project were like trying to fit square pegs into round holes.
meanings.sent5: The nonadditivities of the colors created a beautiful, yet chaotic, painting.

meanings.definition: The lack of additivity in a system.
meanings.sent1: The nonadditivities in the experiment led to unexpected results.
meanings.sent2: Engineers encountered nonadditivities in the circuit design that affected its performance.
meanings.sent3: The nonadditivities in the team's communication caused misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: The nonadditivities in the music composition added a unique twist to the melody.
meanings.sent5: The nonadditivities in the traffic flow created delays during rush hour.
